preloadTrial.messageText: Please wait while the experiment loads. This may take a few minutes.

fullScreenTrial.prompt:
The experiment will switch to full screen mode.
Click the button to continue.

navigation.studentSelect: Press a number key to pick a student

gradeSelect.text2: To get started, press the number key on your keyboard of the grade you are in.
gradeSelect.text3: For example, you would press “4” if you are in 4th grade.
gradeSelect.text4: Press the number key of the grade you are in to continue

intro.text1: Welcome to the Sentence Reading Efficiency activity!
intro.text2: In this activity, you are going to decide if a sentence is true or not.
intro.text3: Some of the sentences may be confusing, but do your best to label as many as you can.
intro.text4: Welcome! You are the new professor at Sentencia Academy.
intro.text5: We have some bright students that need your help with their sentence reading homework.
intro.text6: You will help these students decide if a sentence is true or not.

intro.text2: In this activity, you are going to read some sentences and decide whether each sentence is true or false.
intro.text3: Press the LEFT ARROW KEY if a sentence is false. For example, 'A fish lives on land', is a false sentence so you would press the left arrow key.
intro.text4: Press the RIGHT ARROW KEY if a sentence is true. For example, 'A cow is an animal', is a true sentence so you would press the right arrow key.
intro.text6: Press any key to begin the practice sentences

postPracticeIntro.text1: Great job on those practice sentences!
postPracticeIntro.text2: You are ready to start the game.
postPracticeIntro.text3: You will have 3 minutes to label as many sentences as you can.
postPracticeIntro.text4: Read each sentence silently and work as fast as you can without making mistakes.
postPracticeIntro.text5: It's okay if you don't know the answer. Give it your best guess and move to the next one.

feedback.text1: You pressed the {{arrow}} arrow key for {{type}} sentences.
feedback.text2: is a {{type}} sentence. Press the {{arrow}} arrow key to continue.

postPracticeReminder.text1: Press the left arrow key for false sentences.
postPracticeReminder.text2: Press the right arrow key for true sentences.

studentIntro.paragraph1: Hi Professor! It's nice to meet you. My name is
studentIntro.paragraph2: I'm having trouble with my sentence reading homework. I need to finish it so I can

studentSelect.paragraph2: Press the number key on your keyboard to pick the student you would like to work with.
studentSelect.paragraph3: Press a number key to pick a student

halfwayScreen.text2: You are halfway through - let's keep going.
halfwayScreen.text3: Wow! I'm getting the hang of this!
halfwayScreen.text4: We're halfway through - let's keep going.

endScreen.text2: You are all done. Thank you so much for completing our activity.
endScreen.text4: finished in record time. Thank you for your help!
